name: Varmit
description:
This is a homebrought game, run on Gameboy Color. Original version: Keith Harvey (Howlin' Mad) - Players. Commodore 16/Plus4, 1986. Created with GB-Studio 2.0.0 beta5!

Also available for download in .CIA format for the Nintendo 3DS virtual console!

Well you just about went plumb crazy when you heard your long lost grandaddy left you all his goldmines in his will - but things ain't that simple. He was mad as hell because you never visited him - and he's got a few surprises waitin' down them there 5 mines. Are you afraid to go get that gold?


Start the game: Start
Move: Cursor keys
Jump: B
Squat: A
Reset level: Select (lose a life, recharges time)

Start the game: Enter
Move: Arrow keys
Jump: X, Ctrl
Squat: Z, Alt
Reset level: Shift (lose a life, recharges time)

https://plus4world.powweb.com/software/Varmit

WLS Homepage
